discussion_comments.comment_body:
node returns .invalid_arg in this case
.arraybuffer_expected is only returned in napi_detach_arraybuffer

properties should start with lower case
bun.Sring.init(item.key).toJS will leak memory use `bun.String.createUTF8ForJS(globalObject, item.key)` in this case;
lowercasing properties will break drop-in `@aws-sdk/s3-client` compatibility
Bun S3 API is not intended to be compatible with `@aws-sdk/s3-client` format but with S3 REST API
